title: BRIEF-Integrated device technology inc signed agreement with future electronics | Reuters

organizations.name: alexander winning)  * bank of america corp - credit

text:
Market News | Mon Nov 14, 2016 | 6:53am EST BRIEF-Integrated device technology inc signed agreement with future electronics 
Nov 14 Integrated Device Technology Inc : 
* Integrated Device Technology -under agreement, future electronics becomes IDT's newest distributor of products through its offices in 44 countries 
* Integrated Device Technology Inc - signed a global franchise agreement with future electronics Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: Next In Market News Russian minister was detained at Rosneft offices: lawyer 
MOSCOW, Nov 15 Alexei Ulyukayev, the Russian economy minister charged with extorting a bribe from Russian oil company Rosneft, was detained at the firm's offices, Ulyukayev's lawyer Timofei Gridnev told Reuters. (Reporting by Svetlana Reiter and Andrei Kuzmin; Writing by Christian Lowe; Editing by Alexander Winning) 
* Bank of America Corp - Credit card delinquency rate 1.55 percent at October end versus 1.51 percent at September end - SEC filing MORE FROM REUTERS From Around the Web Promoted by Taboola Trending Stories
